oai_dc:dc.dc:title: '666' painted on boys' monument
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West Memphis Three; West Memphis, Arkansas; murders; Branch, Steve; Byers, Christopher; Moore, Michael; monuments; 1990s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The mother of one of the murdered boys discovered graffiti on the monument.
